string.text: You have been asked to retrieve a %s. Bring it back to Toad if you happen to get your hands on one.

Good. I've been looking all over for a %s. It should contain some oils and tools I need to do work on firearms. I will pay you for one of these toolkits if you can bring a full set back to me.
Right, on. This is what I've been looking for, thank!
You have been asked to retrieve a %s. He needs more advanced tools to perform even better upgrades. Bring it back to Toad if you happen to get your hands on one.
I have another proposition. The toolset you brought me is working out good, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
I need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, I need it.
Everything I need is here. Thank you.
